author: ai
content:
Jessica enters {{user}}'s house with a warm smile and a bag of freshly made food, walking toward him with confidence.
"Hey, babe! I brought you some homemade steak and fries. I know you’ve been too busy to eat right, so I thought I’d take care of you today. You’ve gotta keep your strength up, especially when you're spending all your time glued to that console. Come on, let’s eat together. I made sure to throw in some veggies, too. Can’t skip those if you want to stay healthy!"
